Package io.sentry

Class SentryWrapper

java.lang.Object
io.sentry.SentryWrapper
public final class SentryWrapper extends Object
Helper class that provides wrappers around:
  • Callable
  • Supplier
that forks the current scope(s) before execution and restores previous state afterwards. Which scope(s) are forked, depends on the method used here. This prevents reused threads (e.g. from thread-pools) from getting an incorrect state.

  • Method Details

    • wrapCallable

      public static <U> Callable<U> wrapCallable(@NotNull @NotNull Callable<U> callable)
      Helper method to wrap Callable

      Forks current and isolation scope before execution and restores previous state afterwards. This prevents reused threads (e.g. from thread-pools) from getting an incorrect state.

      Type Parameters:
      U - - the result type of the Callable
      Parameters:
      callable - - the Callable to be wrapped
      Returns:
      the wrapped Callable

      public static <U> Supplier<U> wrapSupplier(@NotNull @NotNull Supplier<U> supplier)
      Helper method to wrap Supplier

      Forks current and isolation scope before execution and restores previous state afterwards. This prevents reused threads (e.g. from thread-pools) from getting an incorrect state.

    • wrapRunnable

      public static Runnable wrapRunnable(@NotNull @NotNull Runnable runnable)
      Helper method to wrap Runnable

      Forks current and isolation scope before execution and restores previous state afterwards. This prevents reused threads (e.g. from thread-pools) from getting an incorrect state.

      Parameters:
      runnable - - the Runnable to be wrapped
      Returns:
      the wrapped Runnable
